title: 2022—The Year the Grassroots Fought Back
itunes:title: 2022—The Year the Grassroots Fought Back
description:
With less than a week left, Charlie does a deep dive on the yawning spending deficit most GOP candidates are facing—sometimes as high as 18:1— and yet how time and again they're overcoming that obstacle through creativity, messaging and grassroots activism around the country from Arizona, to Alaska, Michigan, and more. He brings back Tyler Bowyer, COO of Turning Point Action, to go over some of the latest polls we’re seeing and what YOU can do to prepare for an overwhelming turn out on Election Day.

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
